pageContext.claim: “The so-called experts on Trump over at the New York Times wrote a long and boring article on my cell phone usage that is so incorrect I do not have time here to correct it. I only use Government Phones, and have only one seldom used government cell phone. Story is soooo wrong!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump wrote this tweet from an iPhone, one of two he has, which according to several reports he prefers to use and on which he prefers avoid the inconvenience of security screening. Plus, the tweet says "sent from Twitter for iPhone."
